attributes.action: Lifetime Benefits ban for those and the families of those who are convicted of Rioting and Violent Public Disorder crimes
attributes.additional_details: In light of the recent rioting in London and across the country,violent Public disorder and homicidal Arson threats to Human Life, I propose this petition to Ban all those convicted and their families to be banned from claiming benefits. This would allow millions to be allocated to services such as the Emergency services,Armed Forces AND Education system. If the threat of a Lifetime Benefits Ban for crimes such as this is prevalent then this would benefit everyone.
